post.body: Yeah I have heard that the ISO/ASA levels are amazing on it. Need to get a few more jobs in I think to pay for the bad boy!
I normally use Notepad++ for everything that I do, but was thinking of giving it a go. Cause I might start using it @ work.
Thanks for the follow back, BTW how is the 5DMKII working out for you, thinking about purchasing one?
thanks for the add :) what's new?
thanks for the add, how's are things?
Been using for about 2 months now, great isn't it!?! Have you checked out the portable version?
Oooooooh Beast!
Sounds like you have been taking a battering lately on the blog!
Yeah all sorted now, thank goodness. Was a bit worried about upgrading clients sites before I sorted it.
thanks for the add :)
Canon 40D, 300D and 300 35mm - 40D 'cause of its performance, price and 1.6 FOVC on my 70-200mm - buying a 5DMKII soon though.
The day after Christmas, named after the day when churches would empty their collection boxes.
Sorry about the watermark, they are just images that I sent to a client that I grabbed quickly.
potential. Here are a few that I took http://tinyurl.com/7rczjd - Definitely worth the Â£, what you thinking of using it for?
I really like it, I've only had chance to use it once and that was a quick social shoot. It definitely has some decent (1/2)
yeah I have one, what you wan to know ?
webbynode - Cloud Computing for Developers: There is a new rapid development hosting solution available called w.. http://poprl.com/6mY
Wondering whether to install Visual Studio 2008, anyone use it?
Just realised that I have 3 domains and customers domains registered with Lycos, better move them before they cease web hosting!
Have to hand it to them, that is pretty damn quick -- http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/technology/7788687.stm
I just joined the bristol Twitter Group http://tgr.me/g/bristol and you can too. Please Retweet.
A 12" pizza and a Thatchers Gold at lunch time == Not a very productive afternoon!
Going for pizza today at lunch, rockin'
Quality massage, and some ultra sound on my back. Feeling particularly lumber now!
Phew, PHP script almost finished just need to refine it, off for a massage now, then home.
This PHP script I'm working on is really testing me!
Havana Club 7 year old with lime and Coke, that's a right touch.
Successful install of SQL Express 2005 on Vista x64! Now to configure Accounting 2008 and add all my clients, long night ahead.
Successful install of SQL Express 2008 on Vista x64! Now to configure Accounting 2008 and add all my clients, long night ahead.
Okay, M$ Accounting 2008 and SQL Express 2008 will not work. Now to trying to install SQL Express 2005 on Vista x64. Heres hoping...
M$ Accounting 2008 and SQL Express 2008 do not want to play together, god damn it!
SQL Express 2008 is like installing a full version of SQL -- Nearly done now
SQL Express 2008 has a lot of pre-requisites -- better start gathering them, damn M$
Hmmm SQL Express 2005 won't play nice with Vista x64, going to try SQL Express 2008. Hope it's better!
Does anyone have an invite to otherinbox.com ?
Just about to start on The Righteous Men by Sam Bourne, should be done by the end of the week.
More food, I swear this is the most I have ever eaten in such a short space of time.
How is it that this - http://tinyurl.com/7qhyyc - is more read than this - http://tinyurl.com/9dcxm8 - on bbc news? Man I love society!
